OOC:  Can you say "Bull"?  No wait, how 'bout, "My ass!".  Geez, if this ki=
nd of stuff is gonna be happening, such as people FORCING others to follow =
their plans, I might as well go back to my Skulletron ways, and take contro=
l of every single base.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Legendaryne=
masis@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, October 21, 20=
01 8:42 AM
  Subject: Re: Infecticon Antics(Attn: Airly and LN)


  And on =
another note rauq. In case you didnt know this was an idea worked out while=
 BK was hostage. I agreed to let BK live and told Airly BK would have to re=
turn to the base however and the devices implemented would make sure of tha=
t. The possession type deal is something most infecticons can do to others =
but it is mostly to speak. The deal was set up, the devices were implanted,=
 I told Airly when BK was either eliminated, won the entire IGL, or left it=
 she would be made to return to the Infecticon base. She agreed, therefore =
the post would be legit as it was worked out.  Its too late to take back th=
e entire thing just because now shes had a change of heart. She made the de=
cision to have BK have those devices implanted, now she has to live with th=
e consequences. Besides once again i state I told Proto(Crowlord, Hugar, et=
c) about it before doing it and he had no objections.
